titles.title: Delaware Bay and Chesapeake Bay Sanctuary Act of 1987
A bill to prohibit the burning and dumping of toxic and hazardous waste in certain areas off the coast of Delaware, Maryland, and Virginia.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 8/6/1987--Introduced. Delaware Bay and Chesapeake Bay Sanctuary Act of 1987 - Designates the Delaware and Chesapeake Bays and the Chesapeake and Delaware Canal as the Delaware Bay-Chesapeake Bay Sanctuary. Prohibits ocean incineration or dumping of toxic or hazardous waste within the Sanctuary or at onshore facilities which might affect such Sanctuary. Prohibits travel through such Sanctuary by vessels en route to or from ocean incineration.
